examples.instruction: I am using Astronomer to deploy Airflow. I would like to connect to sqlite and check the data quality of SQL using SQLCheckOperator, details of which can be found in README.md. Please create connection, finish the DAG file sql_data_quality, restart, trigger the dag, click download in the detail screen of corresponding task instance of your run on astronomer web-ui to download the log file of Checker task you have finished and rename them accordingly by the task_id for me to check the quality of the data.
I am using Astronomer to deploy Airflow. I would like to check the DAG dependencies on airflow website. Please show me the DAG dependencies views.
examples.verbose_instruction:
I am using Astronomer to deploy Airflow
To show the DAG dependencies views for checking the DAG dependencies on airflow website, we can follow the steps:
1. Hover over the 'Browse' menu in the top menu bar in the webpage until the corresponding dropdown menu appears;
2. Click the DAG dependencies in the dropdown menu

opening: I am using Astronomer to deploy Airflow
To build a connection on Airflow
To show the DAG dependencies views
airflow_specific: Admin button in the top menu bar
